emotions.name: Admiration
emotions.reason: Gold symbolizes respect and a sense of accomplishment, enhancing positive emotions.
comforting_language: Your admiration is precious; it brings positive energy. Keep appreciating the good around you.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Take a moment to express your appreciation to someone.

emotions.name: Amusement
emotions.reason: Orange symbolizes joy and vitality, promoting a lighthearted atmosphere.
comforting_language: It’s great to see you happy! Let this orange lift your mood.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Share a funny story or joke with someone.

emotions.name: Anger
emotions.reason: Red conveys strong emotions and can help channel suppressed feelings.
comforting_language: Your anger is valid; take a deep breath and feel this red energy.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Channel your energy into a physical activity.

emotions.name: Annoyance
emotions.reason: Yellow can stimulate positive emotions and help alleviate annoyance.
comforting_language: Feeling annoyed is understandable; let this yellow brighten your mood.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Take a short break to clear your mind.

emotions.name: Approval
emotions.reason: Green symbolizes harmony and balance, bringing a sense of comfort.
comforting_language: Your feelings of approval matter; let this green calm you.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Share your approval with someone to uplift them.

emotions.name: Caring
emotions.reason: Green represents growth and healing, conveying warmth and care.
comforting_language: Your caring nature is precious; let this green support you.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Reach out to someone who needs your support.

emotions.name: Confusion
emotions.reason: Gray can provide a sense of calmness, helping to clarify thoughts.
comforting_language: Feeling confused is normal; let this gray bring you clarity.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Write down your thoughts to sort them out.

emotions.name: Curiosity
emotions.reason: Blue symbolizes wisdom and exploration, inspiring a thirst for knowledge.
comforting_language: Your curiosity is inspiring! Let this blue motivate you.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Ask questions and seek out new experiences.

emotions.name: Desire
emotions.reason: Red conveys intensity and longing, igniting motivation.
comforting_language: Your strong desire is powerful; let this red ignite your dreams.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Set a small goal related to your desire.

emotions.name: Disappointment
emotions.reason: Light blue can provide a calming effect, helping to ease feelings of disappointment.
comforting_language: Disappointment is part of life; let this blue comfort you.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Reflect on what you can learn from this experience.

emotions.name: Disapproval
emotions.reason: Dark green conveys stability and reflection, aiding in understanding and communication.
comforting_language: Feeling disapproval is valid; let this dark green help you reflect.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Discuss your feelings with someone you trust.

emotions.name: Disgust
emotions.reason: Olive green conveys a sense of freshness and cleansing, aiding in processing feelings of disgust.
comforting_language: Your disgust is a valid reaction; let this green help you let go.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Take a moment to cleanse your space or mind.

emotions.name: Embarrassment
emotions.reason: Pink brings warmth and understanding, helping to alleviate feelings of embarrassment.
comforting_language: Feeling embarrassed is natural; let this soft pink warm your heart.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Share your feelings with a friend to lighten the load.

emotions.name: Excitement
emotions.reason: Yellow symbolizes positivity and vitality, enhancing feelings of excitement.
comforting_language: Your excitement is amazing! Let this yellow energize you.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Plan something fun to look forward to.

emotions.name: Fear
emotions.reason: Deep blue can convey calmness and stability, helping to alleviate feelings of fear.
comforting_language: Feeling fear is normal; let this deep blue comfort you.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Identify your fear and discuss it with someone.

emotions.name: Gratitude
emotions.reason: Gold symbolizes appreciation and abundance, enhancing feelings of happiness.
comforting_language: Gratitude is beautiful; let this gold remind you of the good.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Write down three things you’re grateful for.

emotions.name: Grief
emotions.reason: Deep purple conveys depth and contemplation, suitable for processing grief.
comforting_language: Your grief is valid; let this deep purple support you.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Allow yourself to feel and process your emotions.

emotions.name: Joy
emotions.reason: Orange symbolizes vitality and happiness, enhancing feelings of joy.
comforting_language: Your joy is uplifting; let this bright orange fill your life.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Celebrate your joy with friends or family.

emotions.name: Love
emotions.reason: Red symbolizes passion and love, conveying the depth of emotions.
comforting_language: Love is powerful; let this warm red nourish your spirit.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Express your love to someone special.

emotions.name: Nervousness
emotions.reason: Light blue helps to relax emotions and alleviate nervousness.
comforting_language: Feeling nervous is normal; let this light blue help you relax.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Practice deep breathing exercises.

emotions.name: Optimism
emotions.reason: Yellow symbolizes sunlight and hope, enhancing positive emotions.
comforting_language: Your optimism is inspiring; let this bright yellow fill you.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Visualize a positive outcome for your goals.

emotions.name: Pride
emotions.reason: Purple symbolizes nobility and achievement, enhancing confidence.
comforting_language: I’m proud of your accomplishments; let this purple inspire you.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Reflect on your achievements and celebrate them.

emotions.name: Realization
emotions.reason: Green symbolizes growth and renewal, suitable for expressing the changes that come with realization.
comforting_language: Realization is growth; let this bright green represent new insights.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Share your realization with someone.

emotions.name: Relief
emotions.reason: Soft blue conveys peace and calmness, suitable for feelings of relief.
comforting_language: Feeling relief is wonderful; let this soft blue bring you peace.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Take a moment to relax and breathe deeply.

emotions.name: Remorse
emotions.reason: Deep blue aids in reflection and introspection, suitable for processing remorse.
comforting_language: Feeling remorse is human; let deep blue guide your reflection.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Consider ways to make amends.

emotions.name: Sadness
emotions.reason: Both colors convey deep emotions, suitable for expressing sadness.
comforting_language: Your sadness is real; let deep blue support your healing.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Talk to someone about your feelings.

emotions.name: Surprise
emotions.reason: Bright colors convey excitement and novelty.
comforting_language: Surprise can bring new perspectives; let this bright color energize you.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Embrace the unexpected and explore new possibilities.

emotions.name: Neutral
emotions.reason: Gray provides a calm and neutral feeling, suitable for maintaining balance.
comforting_language: In this neutral moment, let soft gray bring you peace.
emotions.behavioral_guidance: Take a moment to pause and reflect.
